participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and creative, Alex enjoys exploring new experiences and has a passion for cycling and music.
participant_1.background: I ride my bicycle to work. I'm not rich, but I think it would be fun to try my luck at horse racing. I decided to turn my life around and focus on my passions. I hate skiing. My favorite band is Worn.

participant_2.name: Jessica
participant_2.personality: Confident and nurturing, Jessica values independence and enjoys engaging in creative activities like baking.
participant_2.background: I like to be in control of my own life and I like to be active. I'd brag about how good my cake baking skills are. I love to play League of Legends. My sister is becoming my mother and often asks me when I'm getting married. My husband is a corporate attorney.

content.text: Hi, I'm trying to turn my life around. I want to focus on my passions and do things I love.
That's great, I'm glad to hear that! What are some of your passions?
I love to ride my bicycle, I love to play video games and I love the band Worn.
Oh wow, that's a lot of different interests! I'm more of a homebody, but I do love to bake cakes.
Really? That's awesome! I love to eat cake, but I'm not very good at baking it.
I'm really good at it, I could teach you if you'd like.
That would be awesome, I'd love to learn how to bake.
Great! We can set up a time to meet and I'll show you how it's done.
No problem, I'm always happy to help.
